name: Koans
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
# Current Projects List
*	UCI Report
	*	Auto-expire course listings
		*	After final day of each live course
	*	Select report month from GUI
		*	Able to select current or past months (as far back as db easily allows)
	*	For selected month display:
		1. HTML view
		2. Download as:
			* Formatted pdf 
			* CSV
